mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ogden, Francis Barber, 1783-1857
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mentions the voyages of several ships including the Florida, John Jay, Caledonia, Canada, and Manchester; mentions the passage of Mrs. Douglas and Miss Margaret ? and includes rumors that she is marrying; states Mrs. Douglas' condition of health is low but everything possible is being done to make her comfortable. Autographed Letter Signed
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Francis Barber Ogden, Liverpool, Eng., to James Monroe, n.p., 15 December 1829.
